problem_text_cn: 某河堤横断面如图所示,河堤高BC=8m,迎水坡坡角∠BAC=30°,则AB的长为()
problem_text_en: The cross section of a river embankment is shown in the figure, the height of the river embankment BC = N_0, and the slope angle of the water-facing slope ∠BAC = N_1, then the length of AB is ()
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了坡脚的定义以及锐角三角函数,正确选择锐角三角函数关系是解题关键．
